website_summaries.verdict: This rolling hospital cart has everything little ones need to care for their patients. Doesn't take up as much floor space as others.
pros: Compact in size, but big on features
Cart is easy to roll around and plays the "Welcome to the Hospital" song
Comes with plenty of tools, including a light and sound scanner, talking EKG area, EKG printout roller, and a blood pressure pump
cons: Some parents were a bit disappointed by the size

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves it! Very sturdy! Sings songs and lights up! Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsi Sant

customer_reviews.title: I’m a bit disappointed in this product because I thought it was a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter third birthday. I’m a bit disappointed in this product because I thought it was a bit bigger to be honest and it is very loud. You can not control the volume of this toy, but if my daughter is in another room, it sounds like she would be standing right next to me. Also, the drawer is very hard to open. My three year old always takes out the whole drawer trying to open it. I would not buy this product again or suggest it to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for Christmas for my McStuffins fan. It’s your average plastic that you see on most toys that you can tell isn’t the quality it should be but the toy is still nice. Should it be cheaper? Yes. I purchased additional toys to go along with it as the pictures show accessories that don’t come with it. I planned ahead for that and if you plan to purchase you probably should too as the toy wouldn’t be as fun without accessories. I got Doc McStuffins and the plush crew that fit in the bottom tray of the cart. It keeps the toys neatly where they are supposed to be for a good play time.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what all the fuss is about
customer_reviews.text: I mean it is what it is. A simple toy ( fairly clever with all of its buttons and attachments) and our 6 year old granddaughter who is very tall for her age just loves it. Yes she bends over to push it but most of the time she is playing with it on the floor with her little sister. Out of the box, put together and 2 hours playing with it non stop. Sound quality is good and not too loud at all. It was a total home run for her and we were very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Too loud!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute you and we'd LOVE it of it wasn't so LOUD! Loud as in no one wants to stand next to it when it is playing the song. My kids will push the button then run to the other room to sing and dance to it. We can hear it upstairs and in the basement, clearly, when the song is played. Everything else about this toy is awesome. We just don't turn the volume on at all which was part of the appeal of the toy. If "Santa" didn't get my son this toy, it probably would have been returned.
customer_reviews.author: MelissaB

customer_reviews.title: Very loud with no volume switch. Not all parts easy to use for kids.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter for Christmas. The setup was fairly simple, pretty easy to put together. Daughter likes to play with the vet part. Reason for three stars: 1. The volume is Very loud and there’s no volume switch. It’s on or off. 2. The X-ray part on the top has a piece that’s interchangeable, but it’s really hard to get in and out...even for the adults. 3. The drawer doesn’t slide in or out very easily. Again it requires pushing really hard or yanking it open. All in all, not a bad toy, but not all parts are easy for a 3 year old to use.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: My daughter plays with it EVERY DAY
customer_reviews.text: My 3.5 year old daughter got this for Christmas and she plays with it EVERY day. EVERY. DAY. She absolutely loves being the doctor and taking care of her patients. She also loads up the bottom tray with all of her "doctor supplies" and pushes it around. The only thing that could be improved on is if you put batteries in it and it plays the song- the volume is a little loud. That's ok though, because there is an OFF button!
customer_reviews.author: Holliday1004

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My daughters favorite toy. Uses it for everything including things non Doc McStuffins related. Sturdy. (Our pug loves dress up and plays well with my daughter my daughter plays Dr with this toy and he gets very excited to be patient/brushed/etc like I said very sturdy toy)
customer_reviews.author: Candice Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Soo cute.. but soo loud!
customer_reviews.text: my Daughter absolutely loved getting this for Christmas, and made us put it together immediately! Snapped together easily, and quickly. The only downfall to it is there is only one volume level... and it’s LOUD. It sings the theme song for the show and a few other sayings. I would definitely recommend it if your child likes playing vet/dr. Just don’t let them play with it if you have a migraine LOL
customer_reviews.author: SRH

customer_reviews.title: VERY LOUD
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yr old fell in love with this toy. Easy to assemble and seems sturdy. But I had to take off a star because ITS WAY TOO LOUD! No volume control and it's really bothersome. Like I am on the 3rd floor and I still hear it from the basement LOUD.
customer_reviews.author: M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: NO VOLUME CONTROL!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Is extremely cut and my daughter loves it especially the theme song button (SMH)!!!!!! it is VERY!!! VERY!!! LOUD!!! entirely to loud for a child's toy. Please make sure your child is careful when opening and closing the drawer which is a little difficult to do as I myself have closed my finger in the drawer. So with that being said if you value your quite time this is not the toy. 4 star because my baby loves it.
customer_reviews.author: loveMyAngel

customer_reviews.title: Doc McStuffins Hospital Ca
customer_reviews.text: Every store was out of this when I saw it on Amazon I was so excited but I wanted to see what the big deal was and why my Granddaughter wanted it. Now I know.. my granddaughter spends hours playing with it, she has a love for animals this allows her to express herself. I got it over a year ago and still plays with it and its still intact. She wants to be Veterinarian when she grows up and I hope so
customer_reviews.author: Elvia

customer_reviews.title: If its intended to be for christmas have it shipped to someone elses house.
customer_reviews.text: Somehow the product was undamaged. This is the first thing I've ordered from Amazon where all they did was pull the item off the shelf and just slapped an Amazon sticker on the side of it and put it in the mail. It showed up at the door plain as day for the kids to see. The box was crunched and retaped. Looked bad for Amazon shipping, but looks good for the toy's durability. Had to let the girls go ahead and play with it since the cat was out of the box so to speak, but it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: Our daughter is obsessed
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 year old daughter is obsessed with this hospital cart. Well worth it! Agree with other reviewers that the speaker in this thing is insanely loud. We covered the speaker with cardboard and tape. It’s still loud but a more acceptable level.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki723

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Too loud even when I taped the speaker, falls over and stuff is connected to tray but missing pieces. Like no blood pressure cuff just the pump
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Hope my granddaughter likes it and its not broken.. box was delivered very late at nite.. didn't even know it was there at the door till the next morning and the box was ripped...
customer_reviews.author: Connie V.

customer_reviews.title: Super small and very loud.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two year old daughter who loves Doc McStuffins. It was a good deal for the price but definitely not her (or my) favorite toy. It’s super small for starters. The accessories are cheap looking (compared to other Doc doctors kit items we have purchased in the past) and the music/voice is so loud! There is no volume control which is super annoying. Not the best product but cute and fun.
customer_reviews.author: David W Pekarchik

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is obsessed with this cart. It is easy to assemble, comes with accessories and dog. Batteries not included. This cart is easy to roll around and light to carry in the air if hi need to put it up or fix something
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my daughter! Easy to assemble and she loves it. Awesome price for such a great gift. She pushes it around all day long and helps all of her stuffed animals get better.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey F

customer_reviews.title: Not shipped inside of a box
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a christmas gift for my daughter! And she is going to love this! It's absolutely adorable! Only issue is that my item was not shipped inside of a box! It was left on my porch like if I had bought from the store! Really upsetting considering my child had seen the item and wanted it right then!
customer_reviews.author: tiffany orama

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Grandchild loved it. The only issue is it’s really loud when playing song. It is a great toy just loud with no volume control.
customer_reviews.author: S C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Item as advertised, sturdy and my toddler loves it. We've had it over two months (Christmas present) and she is still entertained with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daugher loved it
customer_reviews.text: It's super cute and my daughter loved it when she was in her doc mcstuffins phase. It's really small though. Probably only good for up to 3-4 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: Steph W.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy.
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit at Christmas and is still being rolled around the house. My only complaint if the song....that same Doc McStuffins “ Welcome to the Hospital” song over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The drawer is SUPER hard to open & close without pulling or pushing ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute little set however there are a few cons: 1. The drawer is SUPER hard to open & close without pulling or pushing the entire cart over, especially for a 3 year old 2. There are quite a few buttons that look like they can be pushed to make a noise or do something but they don't & my 3 year old got pretty disappointed at that. 3. The picture is a little deceiving as it doesn't come with the toy lamby or doctor bag that's shown underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Greyandpeach

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it. I docked you a star though, because that stupid song is now burned into my brain, and haunts my very dreams.
customer_reviews.author: Helpful Citizen

customer_reviews.title: Favorite gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my three year old granddaughter for Christmas but both my one year old granddaughter and the three year old play with it. So happy I bought it because it was her favorite gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this
customer_reviews.text: It has all the tools of a doctors office and is helping my daughter imagine herself making everyone better by doing x rays, checking BPs and giving shots. It is very sturdy and easy to put together, No Man or tools needed lol
customer_reviews.author: Haitian Glamazon

customer_reviews.title: birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: this was our great grand child's birthday gift... it looked really nice when we put it together.. but other than at the party, we have not seen it .. but we are assured that she loved it..

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but no volume button.
customer_reviews.text: Cute, sturdy. 6 yrs old loves it. It plays music, which is nice. But if you dont want it to be loud there is no way to turn it down.
customer_reviews.author: Pam W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old is OBSESSED! She has played with it every day since she got it and it has held up to her craziness. Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Cute cart but smaller then expected
customer_reviews.text: This cart is cute..the recommended age is 3+. We purchased for.my 2 year old average height daughter and she pushes the cart around perfectly, I could imagine buying for a much older child as the cart would be extremely small. The picture is deceiving. Also, thr sound is very, very, very loud and no volume control

customer_reviews.title: Garbage

customer_reviews.title: No volume control
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love this toy. Only thing I hate is it's so loud! We ended up putting tape over the speaker to help.

customer_reviews.title: Well made, cute, but smaller than I’d like
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it, but the whole thing is much much shorter and smaller than expected. The height would be perfect for a 1-2 year old, but super awkward for my tall 4 year old. It’s very cute, rolls well, and comes with some accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Buy earplugs
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get me wrong, this toy is super cute and my daughter absolutely loves it. Which is exactly why I have come to hate it. I’m not sure what sadist created this toy without the inclusion of a volume button, but they are literally the worst. Basically your kid will be extremely happy when they open this box, you on the other hand will come to hate your life.
customer_reviews.author: knc526

customer_reviews.title: As advertised

customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Noisy, but Nice
customer_reviews.text: My 2y.o. daughter loves it. There's no volume adjustment so the songs are super loud and daughter keeps pressing the button to play the songs on repeat. Luckily, when we turn it off she hasn't figured out how to turn it back on.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift

customer_reviews.title: My daughter love this.

customer_reviews.title: The box the cart is in is really damaged.

product_meta.title: Doc McStuffins Toy Hospital Care Cart
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingDoc's the best at on-the-go check-ups! The Toy Hospital Care Cart features a light and sound patient scanner with two interchangeable cards, a talking EKG area with a printout EKG roller, a kid powered blood pressure pump, a real working drawer, and a patient bed! Budding young doctors can roll the kid-sized Care Cart and listen to it play the "Welcome to the Hospital" song from the show. Also comes with patient Findo.
